Namei 2.0 -- Female Half-Elf Druid: 7
Strength: 12 (+1) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 16 (+3) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 10 (+0)
Background: Animal Whisperer Alignment: Neutral Deity: Gozreh (N) Player: Avalon
Experience: 6500/7000 Level: 7 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 8 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 2; Class: 4; General: 3; Skill: 3 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Elf (Heritage); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Animal Companion; Canny Acumen (Perception); Elf Atavism; General Training; Natural Medicine; Order Explorer (Wild); Order Magic (Wild); Skill Training (Stealth); Survey Wildlife; Toughness; Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons); Wild Shape Druid Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Alertness; Anathema; Animal; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Druid Feats; Druid Skills; Druidic Language; Druidic Order; Expert Spellcaster; General Feats; Great Fortitude; Lightning Reflexes; Perception Trained; Primal Spellcasting; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Primal); Wild Empathy Animal Whisperer Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Charisma, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 1 from any Terrain Lore); Train Animal Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Elf; Human Heritage Elf Features: Whisper Elf
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 2 selections
Animal: Has the Animal Companion feature
Druid Feats: 3 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
Elf Atavism: Has an elven heritage
General Feats: 2 selections
General Training: +1 General Feat
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 3 selections
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by druidic order
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Order Explorer (Wild): Can select wild order feats
Perception: +15 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Hunting Lore: +12 (intelligence; trained) River Lore: +12 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +0 (charisma; untrained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +12 (strength; expert) Medicine: +13 (wisdom; trained) Stealth: +11 (dexterity; trained)
Crafting: +12 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +15 (wisdom; expert) Survival: +13 (wisdom; trained)

Diplomacy: +0 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +0 (charisma; untrained)

Skill Notes:
Alertness: Perception Expert
Animal: Skill Trained (Athletics)
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 5 from any)
Druidic Language: Knows a druid-specific language
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 3 from any)
Skill Training (Stealth): Skill Trained (Stealth)
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Train Animal: Can use days of training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Whisper Elf: Can use hearing to Seek in a 60' cone and gains +2 within 30' to locate creatures
Wild Empathy: Can speak with animals
Combat
Hit Points: 92 Armor Class: 22 (dexterity (4 max); trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+11 1d4+1 P/S R10'; dexterity; trained); Scythe (+10 1d10+1 S [Crit +d10]; strength; trained); Sling (+11 1d6 B R50'; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +21
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +7 Hit Points
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +14 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +13 (dexterity; expert); Will: +15 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 2; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Primal: +15 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Primal: 25 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Aerial Form (P4 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 25, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Animal Vision (P3 Div): (1 min) R120' Allows self to share the target animal's senses (save Will negates) for 1 hr
Barkskin (P2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min or until dismissed by target (heightened +2 gives +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
Create Water (P1 Con): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that last for 1 day
Dancing Lights (P0 Evo): 1
Detect Magic (P0 Div): 1
Entangle (P2 Tra): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 min (save Reflex inflicts difficult terrain only; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd)
Flaming Sphere (P2 Evo): (2) R30' Movable flame inflicts 3d6 HP fire in a 15' sq while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex; success negates) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Gust Of Wind (P1 Evo): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Heal Animal (P1 Foc Nec): (1) Touched animal (2 actions gives R30') regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP or +1d8+8 HP)
Hydraulic Torrent (P4 Evo): (2) 60' line inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push (save basic Fortitude; success negates push; critical failure doubles push distance)
Jump (P1 Tra): (1) Allows self to jump 30' immediately (heightened 3rd affects touched, and effects last for 1 min)
Light (P0 Evo): 1
Pass Without Trace (P1 Abj): (2) Increases the DC to Track self by 4 or to 25, whichever is higher, for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last for 8 hr and affect a 20' radius and 10 creatures)
Resist Energy (P2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Speak With Animals (P2 Div): (2) Allows self to communicate with animals for 10 min
Spider Climb (P2 Tra): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Stabilize (P0 Nec): 1
Stinking Cloud (P3 Con): (2) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures and inflicts sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1)
Summon Animal (P1 Con): (3) R30' A level -1 animal appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Tanglefoot (P0 Con): 1
Wall Of Thorns (P3 Con): (3) R60' Creates a 60'x10'x5' bramble wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, and 20 HP per 10' section that inflicts difficult terrain and 3d4 HP piercing for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP, and each section gains +5 HP)
Wild Morph (P1 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains claws that inflict 1d6 HP slashing (requires Wild Shape), jaws that inflict 1d8 HP piercing (requires Insect Shape), resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage (requires Elemental Shape), 10' reach (requires Plant Shape), or a 30' fly Speed (requires Soaring Shape) for 1 min (heightened 6th may choose 2 effects, claws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent bleed damage, and jaws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent poison damage; 10th may choose 3 effects, claws also inflict 4d6 persistent bleed damage and jaws also inflict 4d6 HP persistent poison damage)
Wild Shape (P1 Foc Tra): (2) Transforms self into a Pest Form creature for 10 min or another creature for 1 min, gaining +2 attacks (heightened 2nd may transform into an Animal Form creature)
Magic Notes:
Animal: Knows the Heal Animal primal spell
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Order Magic (Wild): Knows the Wild Morph primal spell
Wild Shape: Knows the Wild Shape primal spell
Primal Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Notes
Companion wolf "Drehina"
